title: Game crashing directly after champ select
body:
Ive been looking around for 3 days for solutions, i watched a bunch of videos and read a bunch of forums about people having the same issue in the past but nothing has worked. 
I dont have lolreplay
Ive tried uninstalling and repairing
Ive tried changing the compatibility to windows 7 or whatever
etc
If anyone has another solution they can recommend id appreciate it :D <3

replies.body:
When the client crashes after champ select, it's often caused by an unstable connection to the server. When the client experiences a poor connection, not only can it prevent you from reaching specific services or matches, but it can also completely crash you to desktop. There are many potential causes of why this could happen, however, the guide *Rineyy* mentioend will touch on the most common solutions.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I received a bug splat a few days ago after champion select as it transited onto loading screen.
Since than I have not been able to play league or spectate.
Instead of loading screen I get a black screen and force quit.

Not sure what to do anymore there are many threads online however no solutions from Riot.
Thats probably it for my lol experience
